Posts.Content: Dec 5, 2010 05:47AM clare2 wrote: I agree about the not wanting any sort of "for fun" tattoo. I only had 5 and the Tech preview comment "these will only prick like a bee sting.." was far off for me.  Mine are blue and they do show up rather radically against my very fair skin. I am not, however considering having them removed. I will have had way too much "messing around" with my body to consider anything else unless medically necessary.
